tool_description:
The Bard API provides a cost-effective solution to interact with Bard, which is powered by PaLM Model. This API acts as a wrapper around Bard AI browser chat, allowing you to access the capabilities of PaLM Model programmatically.

Key Features:
1. PaLM Model: The API utilizes the advanced PaLM Model, which offers improved language generation capabilities.
2. Up-to-date: The model is trained with data up to 2023, ensuring relevance and accuracy in its responses.
3. Web Search Execution: You c...
name: Bard API
title: Bard API

api_list.name: ask

required_parameters.name: bard___Secure-1PSID_cookie_value
required_parameters.description: A string representing your bard __Secure-1PSID cookie (You can get your __Secure-1PSID cookie by simply accessing Developer Consolle and search for __Secure-1PSID  cookie Name https://i.ibb.co/5WHmCQ8/Screenshot-2023-05-30-231728-1.png )

required_parameters.name: question
required_parameters.description: A string representing the question your would like to ask
required_parameters.default: give me list of 10 places to visit in world
